name: Creature Oracles
description: Roll for a basic form, and flesh out the creature’s appearance using this @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.807a6b963f72d7e5]{Creature First Look} table. Then, roll on the @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedoracles.923af7927992abad]{Encountered Behavior} table to envision this creature’s motivation and frame how the encounter begins.
